sentences.en: A glider can soar for many miles.
sentences.cn: 滑翔机可以滑行好多英里.

sentences.en: And go for a ride on a glider airplane, because who says planes need motors?
sentences.cn: 她会去坐滑翔机，因为没人说过飞机一定要有发动机吧？

sentences.en: But Keith feels safer on his glider than in a car.
sentences.cn: 但是基思觉得在他的滑翔器里比在汽车里安全多了.

sentences.en: He put ( the glider ) down in a field.
sentences.cn: 他 ( 把滑翔机 ) 降落在田地里了.

sentences.en: He said that if both engines of the plane had failed, the aircraft would become like a "glider".
sentences.cn: 他说，如果飞机的两个引擎都已经停转的话，飞机就像一架“滑翔机。”

sentences.en: Here in Happy Valley, hunting, snowy scene, a glider.
sentences.cn: 在这里可以跑马 、 狩猎 、 赏雪, 滑翔.

sentences.en: I guess it must require some skills to fly a glider.
sentences.cn: 我想驾驶滑翔机一定需要些技术.

sentences.en: If the glider is set in motion, it is observed to move at a constant speed.
sentences.cn: 假如让滑动物运动, 就可以看到它的运动是恒速的.

sentences.en: Skorzeny landed by glider with fifty paratroopers, stormed the hotel and freed Mussolini.
sentences.cn: 斯科尔兹内带了五十名伞兵乘滑翔机降落, 袭击了该旅馆,救出了墨索里尼.

sentences.en: The film was taken by a camera mounted on a hang - glider.
sentences.cn: 这部影片是用摄影机系在悬挂 式 滑翔机上拍摄的.

sentences.en: The glider put down there at noon.
sentences.cn: 滑翔机中午在那里降落.

sentences.en: The glider uncoupled from the two planes.
The glider was in Dutch airspace.
The glider was soaring above the valley.
sentences.cn: 那架滑翔机在山谷上空滑翔.

sentences.en: The huge, showy booster rockets fallen away, it was just a little glider or an aeroplane.
sentences.cn: 巨大显眼的助推火箭脱离后，它看上去只是架小型滑翔机或飞机。

sentences.en: The model glider looks fine, although the only way we can really put it to the test is to see if it will fly.
sentences.cn: 滑翔机模型看上去很好, 但是真正能检验它的唯一办法是看它是否能飞.

sentences.en: The toy glider she left him as a Christmas present was no compensation for her absence.
sentences.cn: 她留给他作为圣诞礼物的玩具滑翔机并不能替代她的存在。

sentences.en: When you know how to handle the glider well, you feel safe and in control.
sentences.cn: 当你知道怎么很好的控制滑翔器时, 你就会感到安全,一切都在掌握之中. ”

words.tran_cn: 滑翔；滑行；悄悄地走；消逝

trans.tran_cn: 滑翔机，滑行者，滑翔导弹，摆动式沙发椅
trans.tran_en: a light plane that flies without an engine
